Package sbw.project.cli.action

Class ActionCreational

java.lang.Object
sbw.project.cli.action.A_Action
sbw.project.cli.action.ActionCreational
public class ActionCreational extends A_Action
Defines an action processor for creational commands.

  • Method Details

    • doCreateAileron

      public void doCreateAileron(Identifier idAileron, Angle angleUp, Angle angleDown, Speed speed, Acceleration acceleration)
      Processes the action for Command I.3.a.
      Parameters:
      idAileron - - the aileron identifier
      angleUp - - the maximum deflection angle up
      angleDown - - the maximum deflection angle down
      speed - - the deflection speed
      acceleration - - the deflection acceleration

    • doCreateElevator

      Parameters:
      idElevator - - the elevator identifier
      angle - - the maximum deflection angle
      speed - - the deflection speed
      acceleration - - the deflection acceleration

    • doCreateEngine

      public void doCreateEngine(Identifier idEngine, Speed speed, Acceleration acceleration)
      Processes the action for Command I.5.a.
      Parameters:
      idEngine - - the engine identifier
      speed - - the power-change speed
      acceleration - - the deflection acceleration

    • doCreateFlap

      public void doCreateFlap(Identifier idFlap, boolean isFowler, Angle angle, Speed speed, Acceleration acceleration)
      Processes the action for Command I.4.a and Command I.4.b.
      Parameters:
      idFlap - - the flap identifier
      isFowler - - whether the flap is a Fowler flap ; otherwise a split flap
      angle - - the maximum deflection angle
      speed - - the deflection speed
      acceleration - - the deflection acceleration

    • doCreateGearMain

      public void doCreateGearMain(Identifier idGear, Speed speed, Acceleration acceleration)
      Processes the action for Command I.6.b.
      Parameters:
      idGear - - the main-gear identifier
      speed - - the movement speed
      acceleration - - the movement acceleration
